WorkItem.Description:
I found that Visio tends to add newlines and tabs to log path statements so they wrap and are indented.  The path builder throws an error while parsing those paths.
 
I added the following code into SvgPathBuilder.Parse so it can handle them:
path = path.Replace(Environment.NewLine, " ").Replace("\t", " ");
 
I would imagine that SplitCommands could be modified to eliminate the whitespace.  That would likely be better but the solution above performs plenty good enough for my humble needs.
WorkItem.Summary: SvgPathBuilder can't handle whitespace in the path

Comments.Message: Hmmmm I'll have to look into this one. I was aware of the problem but thought that I had fixed it. I guess not!
